description: Single storey front extension,  Conversion of garage to habitable room, Alterations to garage roof to raise height, Single storey side extension, Single storey rear extension (Retrospective)
decision_conditions: <span style="font-size: 14px;">The garage conversion hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the main dwelling (</span><span style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 107%; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">35 Hogarth Road, Edgware, Harrow, HA8 5TR).</span>

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no windows and doors, other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevations of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
